name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: League of Legends Ahri Live Wallpaper

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Step into Ahri's enchanting world with captivating visuals and quick shortcuts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Embrace the charm and elegance of Ahri with our League of Legends-themed live wallpaper extension!

🎨 Minimalist Design: A sleek and enchanting interface inspired by Ahri’s mystique and captivating aura.
⏰ Clock and Date: Stay updated with a display that reflects the elegance and allure of Ahri’s world.
🔗 Quick Access Shortcuts: Navigate effortlessly to your favorite websites.
🎮 Play Games: Dive into Ahri-inspired games directly from your shortcut panel.
🔍 Google Search Bar: Perform fast and efficient searches with your preferred engine.
🚀 More Extensions: Amplify your browsing experience with features as graceful and magical as Ahri herself.
